description:
Seiji has been revived, but the other three Samurai Troopers have yet to be found. The group splits up, with Ryo and Jun attempting to revive Shin at the bottom of the Naruto Strait. But the Empire of Doom isn`t about to sit idly by.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`alliance de l`eau et du feu
反撃, 怒りの超流破
